text: Donald Clark "Donny" Osmond (born December 9, 1957) is an American musician, actor, singer, and teen idol. He is also a talk show and game show host. Donny was part of the group The Osmonds before he went solo later on. He was born in Ogden, Utah. == Other websites== * * Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Utah Category:American child actors Category:American child singers Category:American game show hosts Category:American movie actors Category:American pop musicians Category:American television actors Category:American television producers Category:Participants in American reality television series Category:People from Ogden, Utah Category:Singers from Utah Category:Musicians from Utah
title: Donny Osmond
